text: Oja# EqvOtta#raqtO dha#ttEq tasmA#duttaratO-&BiprayAqyI ja#yatiq vasU#nAM BAqgO#&sIti# puqrastAqdupa# dadhAti yaj~jamuqKaM ~Mvai vasa#vO yaj~jamuqKa(gm) ruqdrA ya#j~jamuqKaM ca#turviq(gm)qSO ya#j~jamuqKamEqva puqrastAqdvi yA#tayatyAdiqtyAnA$M BAqgO#&sIti# dakShiNaqtO&nnaqM ~MvA A#diqtyA anna#M maqrutO&nnaqM garBAq anna#M pa~jcaviq(gm)qSO&nna#mEqva da#kShiNaqtO dha#ttEq tasmAqd dakShi#NEqnA&nna#madyaqtE &di#tyai BAqgO# - [  ] 18
